date_publish: on Mar 8 2013, 11 : 55p No. 1 Creighton Bluejays 65, No. 9 Drake Bulldogs 53
text: The Missouri Valley Conference, aka "Arch Madness" , certainly lived up to its nickname on Friday. Eight teams competed in the quarterfinal round, and we've already had one memorable last - second game. Now there's just four teams left fighting for the automatic bid on Saturday. Let's recap Friday's action. Doug McDermott put on a show as usual, scoring 23 points and becoming the school's all - time leader in points scored. He had help from his teammates, as well, as Gregory Echenique finished with a double - double (11 points, 11 rebounds). The Bulldgos never let this game turn into a blowout, but they never came close enough to make Creighton sweat, either. The Bluejays will play Indiana State on Saturday.
title: 2013 MVC Tournament results and bracket : Creighton, Wichita St. move on.
